allow:
Bash(powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "
# Clear Windows icon cache
Write-Host ''Clearing Windows icon cache...''
$iconCache = ""$env:LOCALAPPDATA\Microsoft\Windows\Explorer""
Stop-Process -Name explorer -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
Start-Sleep -Seconds 2
Get-ChildItem -Path $iconCache -Filter ''iconcache*'' | Remove-Item -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
Get-ChildItem -Path $iconCache -Filter ''thumbcache*'' | Remove-Item -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
Start-Process explorer
Write-Host ''Icon cache cleared. You may need to restart your computer for changes to take effect.''
")

Extended Compliance Frameworks:
- SOC 2 Trust Service Criteria
- HIPAA Security Rule safeguards
- FedRAMP control families
- PCI DSS 4.0 requirements

- IaCSecurityView for infrastructure code scanning
- APISecurityView for API specification analysis
- IntegrationsView for configuring notifications, SIEM, and ticketing
- Updated sidebar with new navigation items

- Complete API exposure in preload.ts with TypeScript types
